data.title: Mahaud (Mathilde) D'ALBON
data.text:
Mahaud (Mathilde) D'ALBON ( -aft1145)

Name: Mahaud (Mathilde) D'ALBON 1 Sex: Female Father: - Mother: -

Individual Events and Attributes

Birth Occupation frm 1134 to 1148 Countess Consort of Savoy Death aft 1145

Marriage

Maud of Savoy, Queen of Portugal

Spouse Amadeus III OF SAVOY (1095?-1148) Children Humbert III OF SAVOY (1136-1189) Maud (Mathilda) OF SAVOY (1125?-1157) Marriage 1123

Individual Note

Mahaut of Albon (11121148), was a Countess Consort of Savoy; married in 1134 to Amadeus III, Count of Savoy.

Issue:

Elisa of Savoy (1120-?) married Humberto of Beaujeu

Mafalda (Mahaut), (1125-1158), married Alfonso I of Portugal

Agnes of Savoy (1125-1172), married William I, Count of Geneva

Humbert III (1136-1188)

John of Savoy

Peter of Savoy

William of Savoy

Margaret of Savoy (died 1157)

Isabella of Savoy

Juliana of Savoy (died 1194), abbess of St. André-le-Haut

SOURCE:

There are no references cited for this Wikipedia article.2

Sources

1Weis, Frederick Lewis & Sheppard, Walter Lee, Jr, "Ancestral Roots of Certain American Colonists Who Came to America before 1700: Lineages from Alfred the Great, Charlemagne, Malcolm of Scotland, Robert the Strong, and other Historical Individuals". p 263, 274B-25; 264, 274C-25.
